Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:斋

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+658B

Main pronunciation 主要发音: zhāi

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning vegetarian diet, to fast, give alms.

English senses 英语理解: vegetarian diet; study

Usage example 用法举例: 齋戒 zhāi jiè (fast)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1983

Shuowen 说文解字: 戒潔也從示齊省聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 齋 mutant 亝 from (rem- 文 wén)(rem- 厽 léi) and (rem- 而 ér)(rem- 二 èr) from altar 示 shì and related phonetic even-grain (齐)齊𠫼 qí C737 齋<亝> A320 斋[齋] simp 斋.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(many variants qi and zhai confused) (originally evenly spaced stalks of grain 𠫸) (add 二 indicating evenness qi) (- add 示 indicating eating zhai)

Simplification rule : A320 斋[齋]

Simplification rule explained :
existing-char cursive 斋齋 斋 (vegitarian diet) variant 齋 (vegitarian diet)

Variant rule : C737 齋<亝>

Variant rule clarification :
齋 (vegetarian diet) TW 亝 <vegetarian diet>

亝字的基本解释

亝
qí
古同“齐”。

亝
zhāi
古同“斋”。

亝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qí］
［《廣韻》徂奚切，平齊，從。］
亦作“亝1”。亦作“斉1”。“濟3”的被通假字。“齐1”的繁体字。
(1)整齐；平齐。
(2)引申指物体平直或两者表面相平。
(3)指思想或行动一致；同心协力。
(4)正；正常。
(5)相同；一样。
(6)犹如；好像。
(7)齐备；齐全。
(8)一齐；都。
(9)召集；集合。
(10)陈列；并排。
(11)谓布列。
(12)平等；平均。
(13)平静；宁息。
(14)谓同某一线或点取齐。指高低一样。
(15)告诫；戒饬。
(16)整治；整理。
(17)传说中的古乐曲。
(18)古国名。公元前11世纪周分封的诸侯国。春秋初期国力富强，成为霸主。战国时为七雄之一。公元前221年为秦所灭。
(19)古地名。今山东省泰山以北黄河流域和胶东半岛地区，为战国时齐地，汉以后仍沿称为齐。
(20)朝代名。南北朝时代，南朝萧道成代宋为帝，国号齐，史称南齐；北朝高洋代北魏为帝，国号齐，史称北齐。
(21)唐末起义军领袖黄巢

亝字的康熙字典解释

【子集上】【二字部】　亝； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页87第12
【玉篇】古文齊字。【說文】禾麥吐穂上平也。【徐曰】生而齊者，莫如禾麥。二，地也，象形。　又山名，勃亝山。見【山海經】。餘詳部首。

亝字的源字形

亝字的起名意思

暂无。

I
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qí］
["Guangyun" ridiculously cut, even, from. ]
Also known as "亝1". Also known as "Hu 1". "Ji 3" was passed falsely. Traditional characters for "齐1".
(1) Neat; flush.
(2) By extension, the object is flat or both surfaces are flat.
(3) Consistent thoughts or actions; concerted efforts.
(4) Positive; normal.
(5) Same; same.
(6) As if; as if.
(7) Complete; complete.
(8) All together; all.
(9) Convene; gather.
(10) Display; side by side.
(11) The disposition is called.
(12) Equality; average.
(13) Calm; rest.
(14) It means that it is aligned with a certain line or point. Refers to the same high and low.
(15) Caution; Caution.
(16) Remediation; finishing.
(17) The legendary ancient music.
(18) Ancient country name. A state of vassals enfeoffed by Zhou in the 11th century BC. In the early Spring and Autumn Period, the country became strong and prosperous and became the overlord. During the Warring States Period, he was one of the seven heroes. It was destroyed by Qin in 221 BC.
(19) Ancient place names. Today, the Yellow River Basin and the Jiaodong Peninsula area north of Mount Tai in Shandong Province are Qi places during the Warring States Period, and they are still called Qi after the Han Dynasty.
(20) Dynasty names. During the Southern and Northern Dynasties, Xiao Daocheng in the Southern Dynasty was emperor in Song Dynasty, and the country was called Qi in history. In the Northern Dynasty, Gaoyang was Emperor in the Northern Wei Dynasty, and the country was called Qi in history.
(21) Huang Chao, leader of the uprising army in the late Tang Dynasty
